lead_paragraph: Johnny Giavotella drove in three runs with his first homer of the season, Mike Trout and Carlos Perez had two-run singles, and the Los Angeles Angels beat the Kansas City Royals 9-4 Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Giavotella's 3-Run HR Helps Weaver, Angels Beat Royals 9-4
headline.main: Giavotella's 3-Run HR Helps Weaver, Angels Beat Royals 9-4

snippet: Johnny Giavotella drove in three runs with his first homer of the season, Mike Trout and Carlos Perez had two-run singles, and the Los Angeles Angels beat the Kansas City Royals 9-4 Tuesday night....
